ai-atk-s0515a6:63_15: That’s why he doesn’t know whether or not he has seen or heard of another.
ai-atk-s0515a6:63_17: Since they’ve eradicated the underlying tendency to the view, yet they can’t be known or seen,
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_0: Thinking it is seen and heard, ‘May it not be seen.’ But this is the craving that craving doesn’t identify with craving, then it doesn’t identify regarding craving.
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_1: ‘I’ve heard a term for sounds of sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_2: And from that sage and from what they’ve thought, they needed to go.
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_3: Reciting the faculties of faith, energy, and wisdom.
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_5: ‘In the known of the mind’ is a term for sentient beings on the dimension of nothingness, or for the continuation of identity. And it is a term for the teaching.
ai-atk-s0515a6:64_6: Then in detail without statement on what is seen, what has been seen, and what has been heard.
ai-atk-s0515a6:65_0: Just now the Buddha shows others to do the same.
ai-atk-s0515a6:65_1: ‘I am’, a term for continued existence.
ai-atk-s0515a6:65_2: they transfer their view to another.
ai-atk-s0515a6:66_0: apart from the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
ai-atk-s0515a6:67_0: all of it, wearing dust and dirt, ashes, organize the peak.
ai-atk-s0515a6:67_1: a trainee, a noble disciple who has entered the stream.
ai-atk-s0515a6:67_2: They don’t become a perfected one, who has become extinguished, cut off, and by both sides.
ai-atk-s0515a6:67_3: with the ending of greed is threefold.
ai-atk-s0515a6:69_0: The World of old age is finished.
